name: Habu Plugin
author: Habu

sections.description:
Built with stringent privacy and security measures, this plugin enables Habu to deliver a unique user experience through WordPress.

It will transport functions safely, avoiding WordPress updates’ overwrites, allowing efficient updates across all sites.

This plugin is built with WordPress Boilerplate and follows an Object Oriented Programming structure for better separation of concerns and uses classes for easy contribution.

Current Features

  • Single Post Id Meta Tags
  • Lists Categories

short_description: Habu's WordPress Plugin. Capturing meta-data functionality across sites.
